text: Steven Hiroyuki Aoki (; born November 30, 1977) is an American DJ and music producer.Kid Millionaire . Dim Mak. Retrieved on January 7, 2012. He was born in Miami, Florida. In 2012, Pollstar said that Aoki is the highest grossing dance artist in North America from tours. He worked with artists such as Will.i.am, Afrojack, LMFAO, Linkin Park, Iggy Azalea, Lil Jon, Laidback Luke, BTS, Louis Tomlinson, Rise Against, Vini Vici and Fall Out Boy. Aoki is known for his remixes of artists such as Kid Cudi. Aoki has released several Billboard-charting studio albums as well, such as Wonderland. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American DJs Category:American electronic musicians Category:American record producers Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Businesspeople from Miami Category:Japanese musicians Category:Musicians from Miami Category:People from Newport Beach, California Category:Twitch (service) streamers
title: Steve Aoki
